title: Setup & Configuration
description: Install gcloud CLI and manage authentication

cards.task: Initialize and configure the gcloud CLI
cards.description: Starts an interactive setup to authorize, configure, and set a default project for the gcloud CLI.
cards.whenToUse: When setting up gcloud for the first time or reconfiguring from scratch.
scenarios: First-time setup: Configuring gcloud on a new machine
Fresh start: Reconfiguring gcloud after issues
New project: Setting up a default project quickly

cards.task: Log in to Google Cloud with your browser
cards.description: Opens a browser to authenticate with your Google account and authorize gcloud CLI access.
cards.whenToUse: When you need to authenticate or switch to a different Google account.
scenarios: Initial authentication: First-time login to gcloud
Account switch: Changing to a different Google account
Token refresh: Re-authenticating after credentials expire

cards.description: Shows all Google accounts currently authenticated with the gcloud CLI and indicates which is active.
cards.whenToUse: When checking which account is active or listing available accounts.
scenarios: Account verification: Checking which account is currently active
Multi-account: Reviewing all authenticated accounts
Troubleshooting: Verifying correct account is being used

cards.task: Set the active Google Cloud project
cards.description: Sets the default project for all gcloud commands in the current configuration.
cards.whenToUse: When switching between projects or setting up a new working environment.
scenarios: Project switching: Moving from development to production project
Initial setup: Setting your default project after authentication
Multi-project: Switching context for different work streams

cards.description: Shows all properties set in your current gcloud configuration including project, region, and zone.
cards.whenToUse: When you need to verify your current settings or debug configuration issues.
scenarios: Verification: Confirming which project/region you're targeting
Debugging: Checking why commands aren't working as expected
Documentation: Recording current settings for team reference

cards.task: Display gcloud CLI version and components
cards.description: Shows the installed version of gcloud CLI and all installed components.
cards.whenToUse: When checking versions for compatibility or troubleshooting.
scenarios: Version check: Verifying you have the latest gcloud version
Troubleshooting: Checking versions when commands fail
Documentation: Recording environment info for bug reports

cards.task: Update gcloud CLI to the latest version
cards.description: Updates the gcloud CLI and all installed components to their latest versions.
cards.whenToUse: When you want to get new features or fix issues with outdated components.
scenarios: Regular maintenance: Keeping gcloud up to date
Bug fixes: Updating to resolve known issues
New features: Getting access to recently released capabilities

cards.task: Revoke access for an authenticated account
cards.description: Removes authorization for a specific account from the gcloud CLI.
cards.whenToUse: When you need to remove an account for security or cleanup purposes.
scenarios: Security: Removing credentials from a shared machine
Cleanup: Removing accounts you no longer need
Account rotation: Removing old accounts after switching
